name: nanobanana
description: Production-ready AI image generation with Gemini Pro. Generate technical diagrams, abstract concepts, and visual content through elegant async batch processing.
author: Your Name

apiKey.instructions: Get free API key from Google AI Studio. Add to .env file (never commit .env)

steps: Clone repository or install as Claude Code plugin
Run: python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate

features: Async batch image generation (100% success rate validated)
Pro model: $0.12/image, production quality, perfect text rendering
Meta-prompting skill for iterative prompt refinement
Pre-built prompt libraries (Context Engineering, Symbolic Concepts)
Zero rate-limiting with smart concurrency control
